title: Almost Christmas Means It Wasn't Christmas!

fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value:
Freeze a card in another player's hand.
- Learn what the identity of that card is.
- If you have any card without a status effect that can be played on said card, give that card to the player.
- Say "HOLD IT!" in the game chat :)

fields.name: - Flipped ( ‚ùÑÔ∏è + <:magenta:1106716255966220319> + <:white:1107514189574045726> ):
fields.value:
Freeze a card in another player's hand.
- **Peek** into their entire hand.
- If you have any card(s) that can be played on any card in their hand, give that card to the player.
- Per card given, give 2 **Card Shards** üî∑.
- Say "OBJECTION!" in the game chat :)
